phrases.usage: Use this to introduce a family member and their personality.
phrases.example: My sister is very friendly and helps everyone she meets.

phrases.usage: Use this to tell someone the age of your relative.
phrases.example: She is twenty-five years old and lives in a flat.

phrases.usage: Use this to talk about your family member's job location.
phrases.example: He works at a small hospital near the city center.

phrases.usage: Use this to describe a common habit your relative has.
phrases.example: She usually cooks a healthy dinner for the whole family.

phrases.usage: Use this to describe a routine activity done every day.
phrases.example: Every day, he walks to the park with his dog.

phrases.usage: Use this to talk about what they do for fun.
phrases.example: On weekends, he visits his old friends in the countryside.

phrases.usage: Use this to explain the start of their daily schedule.
phrases.example: He gets up at six o'clock to go jogging outside.

phrases.usage: Use this to explain when their day usually ends.
phrases.example: She goes to bed at ten after reading a book.

keyVocabulary.definition: Someone who is kind and pleasant to other people.
Having a lot of things to do every day.
Willing to give help and be useful to others.
Making very little noise or not talking a lot.
Doing many activities and moving around a lot.
